role_description: An Ansible role that installs tfenv (a Terraform version manager) on Linux and macOS
role_description_full_overview: [tfenv](https://github.com/tfutils/tfenv) is a Terraform version manager inspired by [rbenv](https://github.com/rbenv/rbenv). It supports macOS, Linux, and Windows.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs tfenv (a Terraform version manager) on Linux and macOS.
